name: Eco Simulation
description: Farming techniques can be further refined through sophisticated computer simulations of different environments and weather patterns. This allows for more predictable crop yields.

name: Bioregeneration Institute
description: The Bioregeneration Institute, at the pinnacle of medical technology, pioneers groundbreaking bio-regenerative therapies, continuously redefining the boundaries of life extension.

name: Nutrient Replication
description: The process of synthetically replicating crops requires a lot of collected waste to create a small amount of produce, but nevertheless provides a significant boost to agricultural output.

name: Biostructural Synthesis
description: Life, in all its staggering variety, is composed of repeating patterns and modular structures. By decoding and replicating these at every scale, we now wield a holistic blueprint of biology. There is little left in nature we do not understand, and less still we cannot recreate.

name: Nourishment Center
description: Every conceivable flavor can be replicated within these walls.

name: Capacity Boosters
description: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.
draw weight: ×2 [IMG:/images/thumb/c/ca/Federation_perk_rare_tech_boost.png/24px-Federation_perk_rare_tech_boost.png] Scientific Inspiration federation perk and another member has the technology

[IMG:/images/thumb/a/a9/Civic_corporate_dimensional_worship.png/24px-Civic_corporate_dimensional_worship.png] Dimensional Enterprise



 civic

description: Mandatory subdermal implants record movement and actions, greatly enhancing our empire's internal security. Loyal citizens have nothing to hide from the government.

name: Cell Revitalization
description: Regimens of periodic cell revitalization treatments keep the leader class spry and active beyond traditionally expected lifespans.

name: Selected Lineages
description: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.

 civic

name: Neural Weaving
description: Through recursive axonal scaffolding and synaptic reticulation, we have developed methods for reorganizing the electrochemical topology of conscious matter. Neurons do not merely transmit - they entwine, organize, and remember. Now, they do so according to our design.
prerequisites: [IMG:/images/thumb/6/64/Exotic_gases.png/24px-Exotic_gases.png] Access to Exotic Gases through tech or galactic market
